      • saveSession

        public java.lang.String saveSession(java.lang.String sessionid,
                           JSONArray startpos,
                           JSONArray shape,
                           JSONArray barred,
                           int ppm)
                             throws JSONException
        Create and save a new session for the user inside the building
        Parameters:
        sessionid - the id of this session
        startpos - is the initial position
        shape - is the entire map shape
        barred - the shape of barreds, usually a JSONArray of row,col as barred
        ppm - pixel per meter
        Returns:
        the sessionid
        Throws:
        JSONException
